verses.verse: Hear <S%H238><s%> us, <S%H7462><s%> Shepherd of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> you who lead <S%H5090><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> like a flock, <S%H6629><s%> you who sit <S%H3427><s%> above the cherubim, <S%H3742><s%> shine forth. <S%H3313><s%>
Before <S%H6440><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%> and Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> and Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> stir up <S%H5782><s%> your might! <S%H1369><s%> Come <S%H3212><s%> to save us! <S%H3444><s%>
Turn us again, <S%H7725><s%> God. <S%H430><s%> Cause your face <S%H6440><s%> to shine, <S%H215><s%> and we will be saved. <S%H3467><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> How long will you be angry <S%H6225><s%> against the prayer <S%H8605><s%> of your people? <S%H5971><s%>
You have fed <S%H398><s%> them with the bread <S%H3899><s%> of tears, <S%H1832><s%> and given them tears <S%H1832><s%> to drink <S%H8248><s%> in large measure. <S%H7991><s%>
You make <S%H7760><s%> us a source of contention <S%H4066><s%> to our neighbors. <S%H7934><s%> Our enemies <S%H341><s%> laugh among themselves. <S%H3932><s%>
Turn us again, <S%H7725><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Armies. <S%H6635><s%> Cause your face <S%H6440><s%> to shine, <S%H215><s%> and we will be saved. <S%H3467><s%>
You brought <S%H5265><s%> a vine <S%H1612><s%> out of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%> You drove out <S%H1644><s%> the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and planted it. <S%H5193><s%>
You cleared <S%H6437><s%> the ground <S%H6440><s%> for it. <S%H8328><s%> It took deep root, <S%H8327><s%> and filled <S%H4390><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>
The mountains <S%H2022><s%> were covered <S%H3680><s%> with its shadow. <S%H6738><s%> Its boughs <S%H6057><s%> were like God <S%H410><s%>'s cedars. <S%H730><s%>
It sent out <S%H7971><s%> its branches <S%H3127><s%> to the sea, <S%H3220><s%> Its shoots <S%H3127><s%> to the River. <S%H5104><s%>
Why have you broken down <S%H6555><s%> its walls, <S%H1447><s%> so that all those who pass <S%H5674><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> pluck it? <S%H717><s%>
The boar <S%H2386><s%> out of the wood <S%H3293><s%> ravages <S%H3765><s%> it. <S%H2123><s%> The wild animals of the field <S%H7704><s%> feed on it. <S%H7462><s%>

Turn <S%H7725><s%> again, <S%H430><s%> we beg you, God of Armies. <S%H6635><s%> Look down <S%H5027><s%> from heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and see, <S%H7200><s%> and visit <S%H6485><s%> this vine, <S%H1612><s%>
the stock <S%H3657><s%> which your right hand <S%H3225><s%> planted, <S%H5193><s%> the branch <S%H1121><s%> that you made strong for yourself. <S%H553><s%>
It <S%H8313><s%>'s burned with fire. <S%H784><s%> It <S%H3683><s%>'s cut down. They perish <S%H6><s%> at your <S%H6440><s%> rebuke. <S%H1606><s%>
Let your hand <S%H3027><s%> be on the man <S%H376><s%> of your right hand, <S%H3225><s%> on the son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> whom you made strong for yourself. <S%H553><s%>
So we will not turn away <S%H5472><s%> from you. <S%H2421><s%> Revive us, <S%H7121><s%> and we will call on your name. <S%H8034><s%>
Turn us again, <S%H7725><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Armies. <S%H6635><s%> Cause your face <S%H6440><s%> to shine, <S%H215><s%> and we will be saved. <S%H3467><s%>
